column1: LEOKA Deaths: Data on officers killed was provided by the CJSC for the years 1990-2014, and the FBI for the years 1980-1989.

LEOKA Assaults: In order to document trends from prior years, and in order to maintain consistency throughout the analysis, figures for OpenJustice LEOKA Assaults are based on data provided by the FBI in electronic form for the years 1980-2012 and on data provided by CJSC for the years 2013 and 2014.
